title: E-Commerce WebApp
description: Developed “KashArt”, a MERN Stack-based e-commerce platform with integrated PayPal and card payment options.

title: Chat Application
description: Developed “TulipTalk”, a MERN-based real-time chat app with Socket.io for instant messaging, JWT authentication, and responsive UI using Tailwind CSS.

title: Multiple Diseases Prediction System
description: Developed a “Machine Learning-based Multiple Disease Prediction System” that analyzes patient data to predict the likelihood of various diseases.

title: E-Learning Platform
description: Developed a website named “EduBag” ultimate educational companion for students, offering comprehensive resources for students preparing for competitive exams like NEET, JEE, and more.

title: LSTM Anomaly Detection System
description: Built an LSTM Autoencoder system for industrial fault detection using Python, TensorFlow, and Flask to identify anomalies in multivariate time series data.

title: Penetration Testing
description: Implemented a “penetration testing workflow” using the Nikto scanner to detect vulnerabilities like outdated software and misconfigurations.

title: Automated Security Testing
description: Developed a user-friendly “web application” to automate common web security testing tasks. The system integrates Selenium for automation and BeautifulSoup for HTML parsing.
